name: Bedroom Modelling Project
description:
This project was intended to help us practice working to a spec after generating a series of design points from an interview.

This is not a full game nor is there really any objective. It is primarily to serve as a record of this project and as a showcase of the assets.

If anyone is interested i'll put together an asset pack of all the models in this scene, just drop a comment down below and i'll see what I can do. They would be free for you to use as you see fit.
